description:
Modify the intensities of one image to match the histogram of another.



References:

* If using inverse contrast normalization for inter-modal (DWI - T1) registration:
Bhushan, C.; Haldar, J. P.; Choi, S.; Joshi, A. A.; Shattuck, D. W. & Leahy, R. M. Co-registration and distortion correction of diffusion and anatomical images based on inverse contrast normalization. NeuroImage, 2015, 115, 269-280

mask_input.title: mask_input
mask_input.description: only generate input histogram based on a specified binary mask image

mask_target.title: mask_target
mask_target.description: only generate target histogram based on a specified binary mask image

bins.title: bins
bins.description: the number of bins to use to generate the histograms

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

type.title: type
type.description: type of histogram matching to perform; options are: scale,linear,nonlinear

input.title: input
input.description: the input image to be modified

target.title: target
target.description: the input image from which to derive the target histogram
